name: Planet Maker Sandbox
description:
Planet Maker Sandbox:

Planet Maker Sandbox is a simple game where you place down tiles and islands that make up the world. Once you have finished you can press f to view the world's history as it progresses. You can still place more tiles while this happens though it is required that you place a village before viewing the history in order to avoid bugs. Throughout the world's history you will watch as villages and castles are abandoned, destroyed, and nuked. I hope you enjoy this game as it is my first on itch.io, though not the first I've ever made.
